entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Yarmouth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yarmouth Airport 11:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -0.2°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -4.5°C

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning late this evening except snow inland late this evening and overnight. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 overnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to a few showers in the afternoon. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
